samples.instruction: Ragging face à®ªà®£à¯à®±à¯‡à®©à¯. à®à®©à¯à®© à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®¯à®£à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Immediate action: 1) Don't comply with unreasonable demands 2) Note names, time, place 3) Report to Anti-Ragging Committee (every college has) 4) Online complaint: www.antiragging.in 5) Helpline: 1800-180-5522 (toll-free) 6) College principal/warden 7) Police if physical harm 8) UGC complaint portal. Protection: Your identity can be kept confidential. Punishment: Expulsion, criminal case against raggers. Don't suffer silently!

samples.instruction: Animation/VFX padippu career-ku nalladha?
samples.current_output: Growing industry! Courses: 1) B.Sc Animation 2) Diploma (Arena, MAAC, Frameboxx) 3) Certificate courses. Duration: 6 months - 3 years. Skills: Maya, 3ds Max, After Effects, Photoshop. Jobs: Animation studios, Game companies, Ad agencies, Film industry (VFX). Chennai: Major hub for animation studios. Salary: â‚¹15,000-40,000 starting. Freelancing possible. Portfolio = key to jobs.

samples.instruction: Kuraipaaduulla kuzhanthaikalukkana sirappu pallikal Tamil Naattil engu ullan?
samples.current_output: Ovvoru maavattathilum arasu sirappu pallikal ullan. NIEPMD (Adyar), hearing impaired schools, visually impaired schools, mentally challenged schools ellam irukku. Ellame free.

samples.instruction: ITI padicha piragu enna velai kidaikkum? Salary evvalavu?

Starting salary: â‚¹12,000-18,000/month. With experience: â‚¹25,000-40,000. Apprenticeship mudhalil seiyunga - stipend â‚¹8,000-12,000/month + experience.

samples.instruction: Farmer family students-ku special scholarship ulladha?
samples.current_output: Agriculture family scholarships: 1) IFFCO Scholarship - â‚¹25,000/year 2) Kotak Kisan - â‚¹10,000-30,000 3) TNAU free education for farmers' children 4) Agriculture Department scholarships. Eligibility: Farmer certificate from VAO, small/marginal farmer category. Priority in agriculture courses. Krishi Vigyan Kendra (KVK) free training available. Apply through Agriculture office or online portals.

samples.instruction: Engineering counselling-à®²à¯ random number à®à®©à¯à®©? à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ work à®†à®•à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Random number: Same marks students-à®•à¯à®•à¯ tie-breaker. System generated, not controllable. Priority: 1st - Cutoff marks, 2nd - Random number (if same marks). Example: You 195 cutoff, random 50000. Another person 195 cutoff, random 10000. They get priority. Impact: Matters only when competing for last few seats in popular colleges. Strategy: Higher marks = random number irrelevant. Focus on marks, not luck.

samples.instruction: Aviation/Pilot training à®à®™à¯à®•à¯‡ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®ªà¯à®ªà®¤à¯? Cost à®à®µà¯à®µà®³à®µà¯?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Commercial Pilot License (CPL) - Flying schools 2) B.Sc Aviation 3) Air hostess/Cabin crew training. CPL institutes: Madras Flying Club, Rajiv Gandhi Aviation Academy. CPL cost: â‚¹25-40 lakh (high investment). Duration: 18 months - 2 years. Alternative: IAF through AFCAT/NDA (free training). Cabin crew: 6 months course, â‚¹1-2 lakh. Jobs with airlines after training.

samples.instruction: Naanu transgender. College admission-la discrimination face pannuren. Enna pannalaam?
samples.current_output: Your rights: 1) Transgender Persons Act 2019 - Equal education rights 2) Reservation for transgender in TN - 1% in education 3) Scholarship: Tamil Nadu Transgender Welfare Board scholarships 4) Discrimination complaint: National/State Human Rights Commission, UGC grievance. Support: Transgender welfare board, NGOs like Sangama, Nirangal. Legal help available. Don't give up - education is your right!

samples.instruction: Scholarship à®à®¨à¯à®¤ websites-à®²à¯ à®¤à¯‡à®Ÿà¯à®µà®¤à¯?

samples.instruction: 12th à®®à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®à¯à®šà®¾à®šà¯à®šà¯, à®µà¯€à®Ÿà¯à®² college à®µà¯‡à®£à¯à®Ÿà®¾à®®à¯, à®•à®²à¯à®¯à®¾à®£à®®à¯ à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®¿à®•à¯à®•à¯‹à®©à¯à®©à¯ à®šà¯Šà®²à¯à®±à®¾à®™à¯à®•. à®¨à®¾à®©à¯ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à®£à¯à®®à¯.
samples.current_output: Your education is your RIGHT! Support available: 1) Moovalur Ramamirtham - financial support for girl education 2) Free government college education 3) Women helpline: 181 4) District Women Protection Officer 5) NGOs: Pratham, CRY support. Convince family: Show scholarship opportunities, free education costs, earning potential after degree. Legal: Child Marriage Prevention Act (below 18 illegal). Study brings independence and better life. Don't give up your dreams!

samples.instruction: Juvenile home-la irundhen. Ippo padikka chance irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Yes, absolutely! Rehabilitation includes education: 1) Continuation of education during detention 2) NIOS for school completion 3) Skill training provided 4) After release: Regular school/college admission possible 5) No mandatory disclosure of juvenile record. Support: Juvenile Justice Board, NGOs, Social Welfare Department. Records sealed - fresh start possible. Many have rebuilt lives through education. You deserve a second chance!

samples.instruction: First generation graduate scholarship eppadi peruvathu?
samples.current_output: Scheme: Parents yarumae degree padikkaadha family-oda mudhal graduate-ku. Amount: â‚¹2,000-5,000/year + fee concession. Eligibility: 1) Parents non-graduate certificate (Tahsildar) 2) Income â‚¹2 lakh kizha 3) UG course. Apply: College scholarship committee moolam. Documents: Parents education declaration, income certificate, community certificate, Aadhaar.

samples.instruction: Government school student NEET crack panna mudiyumaa?
samples.current_output: Absolutely yes! 7.5% reservation + determination = success. Resources: 1) Free coaching - Government NEET centres (apply through school) 2) Online free - NPTEL, SWAYAM, YouTube 3) NCERT books sufficient for Biology 4) Previous year papers - NTA website free. Success stories: Many govt school students top NEET. Challenges: English medium switch, lab exposure. Solutions: Tamil medium NEET option available, virtual labs online. Believe in yourself!

samples.instruction: Semester exam-ku last minute preparation tips?
samples.current_output: Last week strategy: 1) Previous year papers - pattern identify 2) Important questions list make 3) Short notes revise, not new topics 4) Formula sheets ready 5) Sleep properly - memory consolidation 6) Light food, hydration 7) Morning revision of previous day 8) Group discussion for doubt clearing 9) Hall ticket, stationery ready. Avoid: All-night study, new topics, junk food, negative people. Trust your preparation!

samples.instruction: Madhiya Unavu Thittam (Mid-day Meal) pathi sollunga. En paiyan saappiduvana?
samples.current_output: Mid-day Meal Scheme: Government school students-ku free healthy lunch. Class 1-8 varai anaivarukum. Menu: Rice, dal, vegetables, egg (weekly 3 times), fruit. Cooking school-layae. Quality food - district officials inspect pannuvanga. Children grow healthy. Attendance increases. School-la serthaal automatic-aa kidaikkum.

samples.instruction: Free laptop scheme-ku eppadi apply seivathu?
samples.current_output: TN Government Free Laptop Scheme: College 1st year students-ku. Auto-selection based on: 1) Government/Aided college admission 2) +2 marks 3) Community (SC/ST/BC/MBC priority). Process: College alikkum list adippadiyil distribution. Thaniya apply seiya thevayillai. Laptop worth: â‚¹15,000-20,000. Pre-loaded educational software irukkum. Service warranty 3 years.

samples.instruction: PMKVY scheme enna?
samples.current_output: Central Government skill scheme. Features: 1) Free training - 200+ job roles 2) Certification - NSDC recognized 3) â‚¹500-2,000 reward on certification 4) Placement support 5) Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) - existing skills-ku certificate. Duration: 150-300 hours. Training centers: Skill India centres across TN. Register: www.pmkvyofficial.org. Age: 15-45 years. 10th pass preferred.

samples.instruction: TNPSC Group 1/2/4 - enna viththiyaasam? Edhu easy?
samples.current_output: Groups comparison: Group 4 - 10th/12th pass, Clerk/Typist posts, easiest. Group 2/2A - Degree, Assistant/Accountant posts, medium. Group 1 - Degree, DSP/Deputy Collector, hardest. Exam pattern: All MCQ. Syllabus: 6th-12th TN textbooks + Current affairs. Group 4: 1.5 lakh+ applicants, 5000+ posts. Group 1: 50,000 applicants, 50-100 posts. Start with Group 4, then progress. Same preparation works for all.
